content.detailedDescription:
I was outside in my back yard at 7:05pm dec31 2011 and saw what looked
ke a sat or iss of toward the horizon, i told my wife to come look. we watched the first one fly over and i told her that that isn't what i thought it was. i looked up and saw another one a few seconds later then another and another. then we saw a bigger object, same color of lights and shape, just bigger. i t had a small object flying all around it, it also looked as if it may have been changing shape. after about 11 mins of seeing these lights. there were no more and the other lights were out of sight. i worked in air and missile defense systems and know my way around aircraft of all types. what we saw was nothing that i have heard rumors of or have seen ever. if you guys have any theories or explanations please let me know cause my wife is a little "freaked out" after seeing what ever it was we saw that night. they all flew in the same pattern and direction, trajectory was a little different for each one. i could not get a pic and didn't think to get the camcorder, im still kicking myself in the arse!

thanks for what you guys do
brian
content.summary: Rectangle shapes traveling at high speed with redish glow all around craft and 1 white light in center of craft. all traveling in same direction from west to east northeast

content.detailedDescription:
I saw the orbs for three consecutive nights starting 12/28.  initially i saw about 5-6 of them at 5:30 pm on 12/28; went inside to get my dogs and when i returned last then ten minutes later the quantity of the orbs had doubled!  it was so exciting watching them move around in a circular pattern and i was engaged in the energy that emanated from them.  later that same evening at about 8 pm i saw the orbs but this time they were much further away and their shape seemed to be less defined as if they were almost translucent. the first sighting of the orbs they had a dome like circular shape and they were very bright.  i'm not afraid of ufo's and i thanked them for showing themselves!  

on 12/29 and 12/30 i saw the orbs around 8 p.M. and they were high up in the sky and the shape almost translucent with the quantity being maybe 10 or so.

on or about 12/21 or 12/22 i saw what i would describe as a meteorite or shooting star. it happened so fast and it had a long tail and disappeared into the dark skies.  that may have been at my 5:45 walk with the dogs or at about 9:30 pm.  the meteorite appeared to be traveling northwest from what i recall although i'm admittedly directionally challenged!

thank you for your research.
content.summary: They were circular, white orbs that were swirling around in a circle.

content.detailedDescription: I am writing for google translator, sorry for the mistakes can not speak english, well i was sitting in the street when i looked up and saw two objects that were coming at a steady rate but faster than normal, one was bright blue and bigger bojeto the other, the other object was white but the size of a star, came flying in sync, one after the other, the largest first, then stopped both the biggest mover was a strange, then stopped and shot to a high speed. this occurred in 2004, reported that there was nothing i did not know where to report the fact, thank you very much and i hope i say something soon. good afternoon.
content.summary: Unidentified object

content.detailedDescription: It was a warm labor day weekend, and i was the lone passenger in a friend's topless jeep, traveling southbound on route 9 in middletown, en route to an engagement with friends. when we were approximately 1 mile north of the randolph rd. exit, i noticed a glowing light above the jeep, traveling in the same direction (keep in mind, the top was off the jeep). the light was a gold/amber, and encompassed the entire object, which was egg/oval in shape. the light did not flash or emit a beam of any sort. there was also no noticeable vapor or sound (though we were on the highway, and it would have been difficult to discern sound). i realized this was no reflection, nor was it a conventional aircraft of any sort. its shape was distinct, and the entire object glowed. we began exiting on to the randolph road ramp (exit 11), which is a very long ramp that circles around and eventually travels north before ending at randolph rd. ironically, the object circled around in the same direction as the ramp (as if following us), but was now off to our left, beyond xavier high school, but probably not beyond route 17. as we approached the end of the ramp, i told my friend what i was witnessing. he immediately looked up to his left, and saw the object for a couple of seconds, before the object completely disappeared (as if someone turned off a light). it was dark at this time, and we did not notice any object after the light disappeared. we both were totally creeped out, and had the distinct feeling that whatever intelligence was controlling this object was aware of us and "heard" me tell my friend about its existence (thus the disappearing act). to this day, i feel as though the object was following us, as it only made the sharp right hand turn after we had already done so when exiting the highway (explaining why it was now to our left once we reached the end of the ramp). because this incident occurred over a decade ago, i may not have the date entirely correct. but i do remember it was labor day weekend, and i did file a hard copy report with mufon shortly after the incident. i'm only rehashing it today because there is a very similar report from someone (submitted on 1/3/2012), which recently occurred on the same highway in the same town.
content.summary: Witnessed oval/egg-shaped gold/amber ufo in vicinity of route 9 in middletown.

content.detailedDescription: As we were traveling on hwy 520 through tifton, ga traveling towards valdosta, ga(very dark travel)we had been admiring the christmas decorations through a very small town and just as we passed this town and was back on the dark roads i just happen to look up and notice 7 lights in a curved line, except 2 that were side by side lowest to ground, then 1 light after the two side by side ones, about powerline distance from the ground. it initially appeared to be near a powerline, but as i continued to drive, it was clearly not a part of the powerline. i could not stop looking in its direction and i was driving, i yelled and said "do you see that" repeatedly. i knew that they were not normal lights! witnessed by me and another(scared them)very defined, soft red-orange lights. as i was looking back in my rear view mirror i saw one quickly float away and then we were out of view as if they all vanished. i am not a ufo tracker, this is just something i wanted to share because it was something like i'd never seen before. i thought maybe fireworks, but the lights were there like a strung chrismtas decor (which it was totally not)and it was to defined and glowing, nothing visible to see any connection. the formation was almost like the side of the mcdonald's "m" and it was not a bulb type glow. the only thing is that i wish i would have taken a picture, but i do believe that by the time i would have had access to my phone or a camera it would have been gone after i saw it vanish. as we continued to travel i was a bit shakened and continued to look around in the sky hoping to see it again. fyi, this was a dark rural area with very few vehicles and much land for farming. as we'd continued i also saw a bright white light, i thought that from the distance it caught my eye that it was a planet, well we got a little closer and i shared that maybe that was a helicopter, however, it had no sound... i am totally freaked out by this time... this was about 30 minutes apart and they were not similar at all, totally different. the white lights (2)  looked as if it was under a helicopter, but again no sound and you could hear anything on that dark road, and it hovered as if it was still. the sky was so clear i think that i saw every star in the constellation that night, i even saw a falling star. but the lights i can not explain. maybe the military was testing... i don't know. i just know that it was creepy.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: About 7 lights in a curved line accept 2 that were side by side about powerline distance from the ground, witness by me and my daughter (scared her)

content.detailedDescription: it was about a week after my birthday, it coul've been november 16th. me and my brother were on our way to work, he was driving on route 9 north. i looked to the left in the sky, and saw this thing that looked like a gold blimp, shaped like a teardrop turned sideways. it was glowing like a bulb, and that made the exterior seem fuzzy, it was moving in a straight direction northbound in the sky, it seemed to be moving slow, almost stationary, it seemed like it was huge from where i witnessed it. it entered the clouds, i was waiting for it to exit the other side of the cloud, but it never did, i did'nt see it again. my brother said it dissapeared, but i saw it enter the clouds, and my brother was trying to drive to. i've never seen a blimp fly that high, and fly into clouds like that, it also had like a metallic glow to it, like it was reflecting sunlight, but it was a cloudy out. i told my other younger brother about it, and he said his coworkers witnessed something similar, that entered the clouds and came out the same spot it entered in the clouds, almost like a car shifting in reverse, but they witnessed it a week later.
content.summary: Me and my brother witnessed a glowing gold blimp, flew into the clouds, never came out.

content.detailedDescription: it was about a week after my birthday, it coul've been november 16th. me and my brother were on our way to work, he was driving on route 9 north. i looked to the left in the sky, and saw this thing that looked like a gold blimp, shaped like a teardrop turned sideways. it was glowing like a bulb, and that made the exterior seem fuzzy, it was moving in a straight direction northbound in the sky, it seemed to be moving slow, almost stationary, it seemed like it was huge from where i witnessed it. it entered the clouds, i was waiting for it to exit the other side of the cloud, but it never did, i did'nt see it again. my brother said it dissapeared, but i saw it enter the clouds, and my brother was trying to drive to. i've never seen a blimp fly that high, and fly into clouds like that, it also had like a metallic glow to it, like it was reflecting sunlight, but it was a cloudy out. i told my other younger brother about it, and he said his coworkers witnessed something similar, that entered the clouds and came out the same spot it entered in the clouds, almost like a car shifting in reverse, but they witnessed it a week later.
content.summary: Me and my brother witnessed a glowing gold blimp, flew into the clouds, never came out.

content.detailedDescription: it was october 30th 2011, right before 4am, sunday morning. the entire town of middletown did'nt have electricity, because of the unexpected snow storm we got. i had just woken up, and i was just laying in bed starring at the sky and stars, i must have been starring at the sky for about 30 to 40 minutes, when a large glowing yellow disc, flew across my field of view, from my left to my right, across the sky, i could'nt keep following it with my eyes because my neighbors house was blocking my view. i quikly sat up in bed, because i knew what i saw, it was clear, and just by the way it was moving, i knew it was'nt normal. it moved straight across the sky, but it made a sudden left to right move, as if it were trying to avoid something in the sky. from where i witnessed it, it was bigger than a softball, but smaller than a basketball. it seemed like it was high in the sky, but it wasnt covered by clouds, so it was'nt higher than a mile or so. i could clearly make out a perfect circle inside another circle, with a dot in the middle, it was glowing yellow, like a bulb. it was a quite night, because no one had electricity. i did'nt hear a pin drop, and i know i should've heard something, because when i see a plane miles high in the sky, i can still hear a plane moving through the clouds. the disc was flying lower than a plane would, but no sound at all, no trails, and just by the akward movement, i know it was'nt something normal. i would have to say if it looked like the size of a mini basketball from where i was, and it looked like it was no higher than 2 miles in the sky, then it had to be large. i was able to look at it for at least 2 seconds, i did'nt have time to take pictures, but i drew out a sketch of what i saw that nite. if we had electricity, then i would have never witnessed this, because i normally don't lay in bed starring at the sky after waking up. i have thought about what i saw alot, it was'nt a fire fly, because it was way too cold, not a plane or helicopter, because i did'nt hear a sound, and not a reflection of a car driving by, because i did'nt hear any cars at the time, and there were trees knocked down around my streets for anyone to drive. it was moving fast, but i think i could've followed it with my finger if i could. my friend told me i should look online, to check to see if anyone else witnessed it, but i did'nt feel like i had to, because i know what i saw, and don't think anyone had a better view than me.
content.summary: On october 30th at around 3:45am, i was laying in my bed, i was starring at the stars in the sky, there was no noise because no one in middletown had electricity, because of the snow storm we got. a glowing yellow disc flew across my field of vision.

content.detailedDescription:
Looking at the sunset and saw something that looked like it could be a cloud reflecting light from the sun but this was extremely smooth.  as i was observing it it started to change shape, or rather it extended.  off the left side it seemed to grow longer.  after about 5 minutes the part that grew started to retract back in.  after it retracted back in it just turned into a bright ball of light.  within 5 minutes it dwindled down to nothing and disappeared.  

(in the pictures im submitting, the object is to the very left of the palm trees.  this photo is from my phone so its not the greatest quality but you will see the ball of light i observed.  feel free to contact me for any info)
content.shape: Blimp,   Circle,   Fireball,   Oval,   Sphere,   Star-like
content.summary: Bright oval light that changed shape and slowly faded away.

content.detailedDescription:
When vacationing in san carlos, sonora, m���xico, i took some pics of my family. in one of that pics, taken to my father, with my cell phone, when i saw it in my laptop screen, saw a black point in the left up side of the pic, above a mount called tetacahui. i made a zoom to this point and it's strange, because has not a form i could recognize. in the right side of the pic, besides another mount, there's a bird and it's a clear form, but that point looks like a black point even when it apperas to be closer than the birf.

i'm sendin the pic for your analysis. i don't believe in ufo's, but i don't know what that point is.

hope you have an answer to it.

regards.
content.summary: Pic of an object in the sky

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i went outside to smoke and we noticed an object with pulsing lights of all colors yellow-white, red-blue, green-white ect. it was low but on the horizon. i immediately went inside to get my telescope. i got a view of the craft. my wife and i took turns looking at it.... it was triangle in shape and could see 6 lights around the craft. it just hovered for about 15 minutes and then shifted about 7 to 10 mils to the right. it looks small, about the size of and asprin. it is still out there as i type this, but i do not have a camera.... someone please contact me... this is not the first time my wife and i have seen it.
content.summary: Triangle shaped, pulsating lights (all colors) hovering with small shifts in movement

content.detailedDescription: My daughter and i were in myrtle beach, we were sitting on chairs a little after 10 at night. we looked up at the stars and noticed a bunch were twinkling. this was in may of 2011. so we walked closer to the beach looking at the twinkling lights and im thinking the ocean doesnt reflect in the sky, and in just a few minutes the lights started to move in this big black mass and then it started to slowly move out to sea. and then it was gone. it was quite a big black mass. and it was a very odd shape.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Twinkling lights,about 50 or so, over the ocean in a black mass.

content.detailedDescription: I spent my new year's eve, bringing it in with the universe, near birthing rock(near moab, utah). it was awesome, such a clear night, the milky way was beautiful. orion, perseus, sirius, polaris,,, jupiter, were all magnificent. i saw 3 meteorites and right before midnight the moon set. one of the best new years, ever!!! then on my way back i came around the corner towards moab, and there they were. two orange lights. i don't know what they were, but they were ascending slowly and to the east of ursa major.They weren't helicopters.They were orange-red, about 5 times larger than jupiter and 1 magnitude brighter than sirius that night. i would have to guess about 2,000 - 3,000 feet above sand flats. i called the local law enforcement dispatch and asked if their deputies were reporting anything. i reassured her that i am not crazy, haven't had alcohol in months and i don't do drugs and as a matter of fact i used to work for this law enforcement agency. she suggested they were fireworks.. i advised her they were not fireworks, the light was constant and had been there for 4 minutes. then, one faded in about 5 seconds, the other faded about 30 seconds later at the same rate as the first.
content.summary: 2 red-orange balls of light 5x bigger 1x greater in magnitude than jupiter

content.detailedDescription: We were headed to my house in taylor and were traveling east on highway 60. i noticed it as we left show low. it appeared to be a blue star with white lights pulsating around the middle of it. the driver, my friend commented on it some five miles down the road from show low. i said i thought it was venus but it looks blue and about half the size. my friend asked if it could be a plane approaching the show low airport and i said i noticed it when we left and it has remained motionless. he said there are white light around the middle they could be landing lights. i said why would a plane be blue? as we approached the turn at bourdon ranch rd. it shot off at about two thousand miles per hour. it ascended rapidly into the sky and disappeared. i'm guessing on elevation and and distance but i would say it was over concho and at a elevation of twenty-five to thirty thousand feet.
content.summary: Thought object was a star. as we were talking about it, it shot off east at a gradual incline and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: State prison guard, manning a tower on the perimeter.  i was looking to the east.  i saw an object come into my view from the the right.  i thought it was an airplane and i immediately thought, that the airspace is dangerously close.  reality is, the oblect was at an unknown range.  i didn't hear any noise.  about 5 seconds into seeing this, i began seeing sparks being emmited.  object was in view for at least another 5 seconds and it was gone.  the object was a white cole and the sparks were orange/white.  could have been space debris but could not have been an aircraft or meteor.  thanks
content.summary: Single object, slow moving, with sparks

content.detailedDescription:
The orb was moving quite slow and steady.  it caught my eye as it didn't wobble, or flutter... the movements were very precise.  

it slowly moved from the right (looking north) toward the tower on top of the building until the new years search lights shined on the object.  when this happened it reversed direction without stopping and faded out of sight.  it was like it just disappeared.  

it was larger then the birds and i would guess possibly 4ft orb.  there were birds flying at a lower altitude which were obvious as birds due to their movement and motion.

when the search light was within the vicinity of the object it did reflect the light however was not emitting its own source of light.

i was on the southern side of the yarra river with family waiting for the new years ever fireworks to start at midnight.  the sighting took place at approx 11:18pm
content.summary: Orb hovered over melbourne skyscraper

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
While giving my friend a ride home at approximately 11:45pm, a light caught my eye from in between some trees. as i continued to drive, from within a opening among the trees i saw what i can only describe as a perfect sphere that glowed a brilliant white. the sphere quickly got brighter and an aura seemed to have appeared, and just as quickly as i notice it the sphere sped off into nothing, leaving a trail of light that looked as if it receded back into where ever the sphere went.

i smacked my friend and asked if he saw it; staring at his cell phone, alas he did not.

it shook me. the whole event probably lasted only 3 or 4 seconds, but it was not something i can forget. it gave me a feeling of anxiety and fear instantly, and it made time seem to slow down.

it's exit was so dramatic, i was sure my friend had seen it too. i can only gather it lasted that short because i didn't have time to alert my friend before it was gone.

the most peculiar part of this was the feeling it gave me, because it was almost like it's departure was in reaction to my seeing it. the moment i saw it, it was the biggest thing in the sky by far, and the way it left quickened my pulse and triggered my fight/flight response.

for reasons i'm still not sure of yet, the first thought in my head was "god, i'm not ready." i'm still trying to figure that out. i don't know if i thought it was there for me, or that i was terribly frightened. but that's what i remember feeling. 

truly an unforgettable experience.
content.summary: Large white glowing orb takes off in winter park, fl

content.detailedDescription:
Myself and two others were camping in the uwharrie nf. we were star gazing as there were a ;large number of shooting stars that night. i had seen a few satelites passby and was pointing them out too my friends when one looked as if it just got ten times brighter and then was no longer visiable.There were two other objects that done the same thing over a time frame of just a few mins each coming from a diffrent part of the sky. the weird thing was the objects got bright and disappeared in the same spot in the sky, right in the middle of a cluster of close star type of lights that formed a triangle.If you hold out your arm at full lenght and spread your fingers apart about an inch that was the size of the cluster in the starfield . best way i can give you a size and distance from us.
i'd like to talk with someone about this to help me understand just what we saw that night.
content.summary: 3 star like objects  came togther into a triangle

content.detailedDescription: 1 orange orb/ball seen from 9th floor of my building & another seemingly behind it.  both then seemed to ascend and disapper.  clear sky after the new years fireworks ended - no other planes in the sky at that time.
content.summary: 2 orange orbs hovering then disapearing as they rose up in the night sky.

content.detailedDescription:
Right after midnight on new years eve, i witnessed strange lights in the sky near shenanigans pub (corner of norris and deerwood) in louisville. several other patrons saw the lights and i was able to snap a few photos (attached) and my friend was able to record some video. the lights were orange glowing balls and travelled generally south to north and appeared to be powered. ambient noise from the bar was loud so i couldn't hear if the lights made any noise. they travelled one after another along the same path at erratic intervals, although usually around twenty or thirty seconds apart. they travelled in a straight flight path and that path generally drifted and changed to the northwest as the event took place. they were below the cloud cover, but one did go through the lowest clouds. i estimate i saw around twenty and that the whole event lasted 10 or 20 minutes. to recap, they travelled at approximately the same altitude and along the same path.

they glowed a dark orange and didn���t seem to flash. when viewing them through my camera phone they seemed to flash at a constant rate. i lost sight of the objects because the buildings obstructed the view.

my friend who also witnessed the event is a pilot and called standiford field air traffic control (louisville international airport) and they said they had nothing flying in the area. both of us called the police and the dispatcher said we were the only people to call it in. and we called a local news station tip line who told us we were the only callers to report the event. i also emailed all four local news stations with the facts and photos on january 1st and received no response.

finally, in one of the photos some non-glowing spots are visible. i���m didn���t see those during the event so i���m not sure if they are due to reflections or some other camera error, or if they are related to the event.
content.summary: Fireball over louisville, ky on new years

content.detailedDescription: While facing the eastern sky over the bay of islands in kerikeri, nz my friend and i were sitting in our car staring at the night sky. a bright orange orb/light appeared over the tree line low in the sky and suddenly turned on and off for about an hour. eventually, this bright orange light began to move in fast and erratic directions just above the tree line for about five minutes.  at one point it moved west, closer to us and its brightness intensified.  light radiated from the object and it even lit up the hillsides, less than a mile away with light.  it then dimmed as it moved to its original position of about 2-3 miles away and then suddenly vanished. shortly after, we noticed two white lights (the size of large stars) higher in the night sky, not too far apart, that began to move in unison with each other. they were teetering almost, as one moved up, the other moved down, and so forth like a see-saw. this happened for a couple hours and then the orange light from before appeared again above the tree line in its original position, directly below the centre of the two white lights.  when the orange light appeared, the two lights in the sky stopped moving immediately. then the orange light above the tree line ground vanished as if someone flicked a light switch, and the two white lights in the sky began moving in unison again. this happened repeatedly for about an hour.  at one point when the orange light appeared and the white lights stopped, they all began to move in unison with each other, moving north and then south.  the two white lights in the sky and the orange light above the tree line formed a perfect upside down triangle as they moved slowly in unison, always keeping the shape of an upside-down triangle as they moved.  the orange light would then vanish and the two white lights returned to their prior movements.  we began to scan the rest of the night sky, discovering 2 other pairs of lights, of the exact brightness and separated by the same distance, teetering identically to the first pair of white lights we saw.  at this point, one pair of see-sawing lights could be seen in the east over the coast, another pair in the southern sky and another pair in the northern sky. another object was also spotted with about 3 lights in the north eastern sky, that seemed to be slightly rotating. although it was very dark and these objects were high in the night sky, you were almost able to distinguish a shape that connected the different pair of lights. at this point, we saw 4 different sets of lights throughout the sky, all in motion.  we witnessed these lights until we fell asleep around 4-5am.  i tried taking a video of the moving lights but because of how dark it was, the lights cannot be seen in the video.  with some sort of video enhancement software, i���m confident the video will render the lights if the image can be lightened.  there was no rational explanation for these lights and their actions, so we made 2 police reports to the auckland police department, who claimed to contact kerikeri police. this was an unexplainable occurrence and my friend and i have never been so scared before in our lives.  we considered leaving the area and driving inland at one point because of the lights in the sky.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Witnessed over 10 different lights in a clear nz night sky at once, event lasted from 10pm-5am

orange light from before appeared again above the tree line in its original position, directly below the centre of the two white lights.  when the orange light appeared, the two lights in the sky stopped moving immediately. then the orange light above the tree line ground vanished as if someone flicked a light switch, and the two white lights in the sky began moving in unison again. this happened repeatedly for about an hour.  at one point when the orange light appeared and the white lights stopped, they all began to move in unison with each other, moving north and then south.  the two white lights in the sky and the orange light above the tree line formed a perfect upside down triangle as they moved slowly in unison, always keeping the shape of an upside-down triangle as they moved.  the orange light would then vanish and the two white lights returned to their prior movements.  we began to scan the rest of the night sky, discovering 2 other pairs of lights, of the exact brightness and separated by the same distance, teetering identically to the first pair of white lights we saw.  at this point, one pair of see-sawing lights could be seen in the east over the coast, another pair in the southern sky and another pair in the northern sky. another object was also spotted with about 3 lights in the north eastern sky, that seemed to be slightly rotating. although it was very dark and these objects were high in the night sky, you were almost able to distinguish a shape that connected the different pair of lights. at this point, we saw 4 different sets of lights throughout the sky, all in motion.  we witnessed these lights until we fell asleep around 4-5am.  i tried taking a video of the moving lights but because of how dark it was, the lights cannot be seen in the video.  with some sort of video enhancement software, i���m confident the video will render the lights if the image can be lightened.  there was no rational explanation for these lights and their actions, so we made 2 police reports to the auckland police department, who claimed to contact kerikeri police. this was an unexplainable occurrence and my friend and i have never been so scared before in our lives.  we considered leaving the area and driving inland at one point because of the lights in the sky.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Witnessed over 10 different lights in a clear nz night sky at once, event lasted from 10pm-5am

content.detailedDescription: It was already very dark outside, 6:27-6:28pm, according to my iphone. i was standing outside in north hollywood, california, leaving a photo shoot, when my photographer noticed three amber-reddish lights in the western sky, just below and to the left of an extremely bright star (or planet). sorry ~ i do not know the name of the star. we assumed these lights to be flying over the pacific ocean. the lights looked like they might have come from any plane, except that these lights were flying in a perfect triangle pattern and they were definitely not white lights.  these three amber lights slowly moved due north under the star, and two of the three lights dropped back out of the triangle pattern to form a perfectly straight line. then this line of lights suddenly faded and disappeared uniformly into the night.  this whole sighting lasted about 1-2 minutes.
content.summary: From north hollywood, cahuenga & 134 fwy: spotted 3 amber lights due west, triangle formation that straightened out, heading north, over pacific ocean.

content.detailedDescription: On 01-01-2012 at approximately 2220 my wife went to the store to buy our baby some milk. i sat at my home with my 5yr old son playing my xbox and waited for her to return. while i was waiting i heard a car approaching my home honking it was now approximately 2230. i looked out of the window and saw my wife jump out of the car, she was yelling "hurry come out here". i then ran out of my house as my son followed. when i got outside in the front yard where my wife was she then point in the sky and said "look". i stood in amazement at the object in the sky. it was huge. from what i could tell this object appeared to be at least a football field big. it formed a semi-circle in the night sky. there were six buring lights spaced a good distance from each other in the sky that formed a semicircle. the object was moving west at first towards our location. the object then appeared to begin to move north away from our location. the lights were moving together as one. when the object began moving north, the lights began to fade out one at a time. all the lights had pretty much faded when the object was already traveling north away from us. all of the lights were almost gone execept the last two lights they were dimmed almost all the way but they were still visible if you would focus on them. at this time a truck passed by our house slowly. the vehicle then went in reverse and a man asked "did you  just see that" he told me he had been watching it from a nereby store parking lot. my wife didn't even end up at the store to get the milk before she raced home so i could see the object, so she again left to get milk. i then went outside in the back yard to turn off the christmas lights, so i could continue to observe the sky hoping i would see something else. at approximately 10 minutes after the sighting, i saw 3 jets coming from the west towards the location of the sighting. there was also 2 jets that were coming from the south towards the location. i then watched the jets in amazement because the jets appeared to have there afterburners on. after a few minutes of observing the sky i noticed the jets had left the location of the sighting and were moving west. later my wife and i were inside the house dicussing what we had seen. i then relized that was she had seen since the beginning was completely different from what we were seeing together. she had seen basically the whole craft. i only saw a semicircle. i only saw part of it. we then went out of the house back to where we had seen the obect. this is were i realized that there were no stars in the sky during this incident, even though at this time the sky was clear and full of stars.
content.summary: The object had red-orange lights that was heading west but changed direction and went north.

content.detailedDescription:
I will preface by stating that i am a retired police officer, and commonly stargaze and, in the process, always view a lot of air traffic near and over my home in the evenings.  i was not under the influnece of any substance at the time of the observation. it is noted that the nearest airport to my location is orlando-sanford int'l.  

upon randomly opening my back door looking out to the southern sky after dark, i noticed the (questioned) object right away.  at least two (known) small aircraft with common running and landing light gear (as well as "sound") were in the area, thus gaining my focused attention to the object. i immediately proceeded outside my home and exited a screen enclosure to reduce my view obstruction.

i categorize this object as "out of the ordinary". it was a large orb-like object, bright copper/bronze color, traveling north/northeast from the northern area of the st. john's river branch west of i-4 causeway.  it ran totally silent, in acute contrast to the aforementioned aircraft in the area. it did not blink, pulse, or otherwise display any color variation whatsoever.  it appeared larger (about the size of 2-3 common police helicopters, but without the distinct engine noise of same) as it proceeded closer to my point of observation. as it continued its path, the object made a left 30 degree arcing turn followed by a 60 degree arc to the right (an "s" configuration if you will).  it proceeded in a southeasterly direction and faded out of sight.  the object maintained a constant altitude of approx.400 to 600 feet.  at the time of the event, i had no immediate access to a multimedia device and just wanted to maintain visual contact for as long as i could.

after the event, i elected not to immediately report the sighting, as i was compelled to re-evaluate the event and make other comparisons before i determined in my mind that the orb was genuinely anomolous.
content.summary: Large copper colored orb, running silent, directional s turn, traveled n/e to s/e out of sight, other known aircraft present.

content.detailedDescription: Ok. look, me and my friends were getting wasted new years eve and all of the sudden this flare like object shot up about 500 hundered feet away or so from us, east. it proceded south and followed the channel then changed directions and went east out to sea.It then changed directions again and went slightly upwards then faded out. cazy huh? i know. you would have to see it to beileve it! d-truth.
content.summary: Bright orange red object above town

content.detailedDescription: I was smoking a cigerette on the porch. what made me notice it was because it was so bright and lower then all the stars. i looked around and saw airplanes passing it and it was  the same level of the planes so i knew it was lower than a star. it was blinking red and white. i told my co worker to come outside and was like is that a star. she saw it and said no that's too low for a star that's a plane then i said but its not moving she said your right and called our other co worker out who said the same thing. they wnt inside cause they got freaked out. this happened around 735pm. i stayed outside watching it. it was blinking red and white slow and before it flew up and disappeared it was flashing red really fast. it shot up so fast i lost sight. my feelings with this was i was shocked and amazed. i was thinking is this really what i'm seeing. it freaked me out after it disappeared
content.summary: It was str like but blinking red and white really fast and not moving then shot up into the air

content.detailedDescription: I try to travel down ward parkway on christmas eve every year and view the chritsmas lights on the houses along ward parkway. my ending point is the plaza in midtown kansas city. traveling north on ward parkway towards the plaza lights, i approached an intersection,stopped at the light on red started driving when the light turned green. as i started driving north i noticed a church on the right with cars parked outside the church on the curb running parallel to the church. i looked up and saw a rectangular object with strobe lights flashing on the left of the rectangle and i could barely see the white strobe light flashing on the far right of the triangle because of the trees.The center strip had an orange glow .The trees were obstructing some of the view, and the street lights were blending in with the lighted object. this object was as wide as two traffic lanes and about two to three hundred feet above the top of the trees. i immediatly thought it was a traffic helicopter but soon realized it was hovering. i had the moon roof shield open and watched this object go over my car over the top of the trees, and as i looked to the rear of my car at the object i soon realized i could still see the orange glow and thought then the glow was coming from under the object.I immediatly thought of turning around and following the object as it moved southeast , but soon realized ward parkway is one way for both sides. i really did not know what to think. i would also mention there were people across from the church on the road going east and west standing on the curb or sidewalk. i do not know if they were waiting for the traffic to move so they could cross the street to go to the church, or were watching this rectangular object. this experience is strange in that i did not really put all the information together until i got home. i know there is a plane service that you can rent to view the plaza lights by air and thought that was what i had seen. but what i saw was a lot lower in altitude towards the ground. i had the radio on listening to holiday music, and i am not sure if there was any sound from the object. i am glad i had the courage to inform you of this occurance,i could not hold it in any longer without telling someone!
content.summary: White strobe light on each end of rectangle with orange glow in center between strobe lights
